whoopee.configuration.fallTootChance.too: The chance for a toot sound to play when falling on a Whoopee Cushion [Default: 1.0]
whoopee.configuration.fallingPlayerTootC: The chance for a toot sound to play when the player falls while wearing a Whoopee Cushion on their head [Default: 0.4]
whoopee.configuration.inventoryTootChanc: The chance for a toot sound to play when an inventory is opened containing a Whoopee Cushion [Default: 0.15]
whoopee.configuration.stepTootChance.too: The chance for a toot sound to play when walking on a Whoopee Cushion [Default: 0.05]
whoopee.configuration.title: Whoopee Config
whoopee.cushion_tooltip: Shift right-click to place on the ground, right-click to play a toot sound
